name: Retro Rumble
description:
A collection of 3 Classic Retro Games made in 96x96 resolution for the 3rd Major Jam. The theme was Retro and the Limitation was that the resolution cannot exceed 96x96 pixels

Made in 7 days.

Controls

  1. Pong Controls: A and D to move the Paddle
  2. Space Invaders Controls: A & D to move the ship and Space to shoot
  3. Asteroids Controls: A & D to rotate the ship, Space to add thrust, and Left Click to shoot.
